courses.name: Angular cli
courses.description: Angular is an application-design framework and development platform for  creating efficient and sophisticated single-page apps. Angular is a development platform, built on TypeScript. As a platform, Angular includes:      A component-based framework for building scalable web applications.   A collection of well-integrated libraries that cover a wide variety of features, including routing, forms management, client-server communication, and more.     A suite of developer tools to help you develop, build, test, and update your code

courses.name: Vue.js
courses.description: Vue is a JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. It builds on top of standard HTML, CSS and JavaScript, and provides a declarative and component-based programming model that helps you efficiently develop user interfaces, be it simple or complex.

courses.name: .Net Core
courses.description: .NET is a free, cross-platform, open source developer platform for building many kinds of applications. .NET is built on a high-performance runtime that is used in production by many high-scale apps
